review:
Excellent experience with Doctor ! 
Friendly and encouraging makes the patient feel at ease. I was very happy with the consultation .

I had been to hospital and it was for normal heart checkup. ********* *** **** ** *** ******* I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. There was no waiting time when we went. Weight was checked. Walking was suggested. Doctor was friendly.

I had been to hospital and it was for anxiety issues. ********* *** **** ** *** ******* I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. There was waiting time in the hospital. It was for 30 minutes. Tests was done and results was fine. Doctor was friendly. Staff were very cooperative. It was panic attack and he told to not to stress much.

My mother had been to hospital and it was for chest pain. Doctor was good in consulting me and he was helpful. He gave genuine advice. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. We had good results. There was not much waiting time in the hospital.  Doctor was very friendly. He explained well and give proper instructions.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
After a wait of 30 minutes or so .. I finally got to see the doctor. He listened to my background for 2 minutes. Looked at my blood reports and then dismissed the whole thing saying "he doesnt trust these kind of reports"

He asked me to get another round of tests done at his own lab, and said come back in 3 days. 

All this happened in span of 5 minutes. I was given no chance to ask questions, and when I insisted he said I can not answer anything today 

Weirdest doctor interaction ever.

My dad had been to hospital and it was for diabetes related. Consultation was good by the doctor. We are satisfied with the explanation and treatment given by the doctor. He met doctor second time. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Tests was done. Diet was suggested. Doctor was friendly.

My uncle had high BP and hyper tension so went to hospital. ********* *** **** ** *******  She is satisfied with the explanation and treatment given by the doctor. Medicine was prescribed by doctor during consultation for BP related. Echo test was done. Diet was suggested.

I had consulted the doctor and it was for health concern. Consultation was very good by the doctor. I would like to recommend the doctor to other people. I am satisfied with the explanation given by the doctor. Tests was done outside and we took reports. There was no waiting time in the hospital. Exercise was suggested.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We  visited Dr Praveen Kulkarni for my mother’s heart ailment. Dr Praveen is not only a professional par excellence but also a great human being. He explained the cardiac  condition in simple terms and greatly helped us in taking the right decision. My mother’s angioplasty procedure was complex and Dr Praveen treated her with the utmost care. May God Bless Dr Praveen and may he continue to serve the mankind for years to come.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Praveen did a great job with my first ever hearst exam. He explained everything to me in a very clear manner. He was also very friendly. I was already feeling better after the consultation. Cheeers !!!
